original_text: And the Lord turned the wind into a very strong west wind, which lifted the locusts and drove them into the Red Sea. Not a single locust was left in all the country of Egypt.
korean_text: 여호와께서 돌이켜 강렬한 서풍을 불게 하사 메뚜기를 홍해에 몰아넣으시니 애굽 온 땅에 메뚜기가 하나도 남지 아니하니라

sentences.original_text: And the Lord turned the wind into a very strong west wind
sentences.korean_translation: 주께서 바람을 매우 강한 서풍으로 바꾸셨고

sentences.original_text: and drove them into the Red Sea
Not a single locust was left in all the country of Egypt
sentences.korean_translation: 애굽 온 땅에 메뚜기 한 마리도 남지 않았습니다
